What's New

  • nn-XXX-2019: The first "official" update released. Aside from an improved web design, it includes translations of Sutra 29 of the Long Discourses and Sutras 1-7 of the Medium Discourses.
  • 15-SEP-2009: The Dharma Pearls repo on Github goes public and is published on Guthub Pages. This was a broken web design. The release was simply to walk-through the Github Pages deployment process.
